messages.subject: Hi~~I'm new to the group
messages.msgSnippet: and to unschooling! I found this group on a yahoo search. I joined because I am curious about unschooling, radical, . I have been doing this all along I guess
messages.messageBody:
and to unschooling! I found this group on a yahoo search. I joined because I
am curious about unschooling, radical, . I have been doing this all along I
guess but now the time is coming up when everyone is asking me what we are
doing about our son in the fall. I'm sure that comes up a lot in here. So I
don't have any particular questions right now but I thought I'd post my
intro before I'm a member for 2 years and forget (that could happen!).
I am Jen a sahm of 2 kids. Ben is 5, Hannah is 4 and Noah is 20mo. We live
in San Diego, CA. We are an AP family and we belong to several AP groups
locally. I run a weekly AP playgroup for all ages but my Ben is the oldest
in the group. I really opened the group so that I could hook him up with
some friends his age, but no one came :( . Anyway, it is a large group.
Anyway, we plan on homeschooling them in the fall (supposed to be in K) but
haven't really made any decision on HOW! So that's why I'm here....to learn
from you!
Thanks for having me!
Jen

==========================

I teach The Bradley MethodR natural childbirth
